text: I choose the licence "Information & communication" because this licence can bring a lot of competences witch can be use in many jobs. I hesitate with STAPS because I'm really passionate by sports in general but I decide to take "Info-Com". Nobody in my family really inspired me except my mom who works like social assistant. Moreover, I'm not a scientific, last year, I had not really good notation in mathematics and physic chemistry. I prefer Economic and Social Sciences and I prefer write at calculate. I don't have a fix idea of my future job, I'm very dynamic and I don't like to stay at the same place and do the same job too long. I think I will change many times of jobs. When I was young, I wanted to be journalist, because, you can move and discover a lot of things. So I finally decided to take this licence because, like I say in the beginning of my text, this licence bring a lot of competences in many domains and if I pass my exams, I maybe become a journalist. If I choose the University at Rennes2, it's because I from Paris and I wanted to move and go to a taller city. Paris is not too far of Paris, so I can see my family when I want but I have my appartement in Paris. I'm independent now and I really appreciate that. I think I say all I could say.
